CO2 Data for the EU Residential Sector

Source: R/data.R
EUCO2residential.Rd

CO2 Data for the EU Residential Sector

Usage

EUCO2residential

Format

A data frame with 1550 rows and 9 variables:

country

Country

year

Year

lgdp

Log Gross Domestic Product

lhdd

Log Heating Degree Days

lcdd

Log Cooling Degree Days

urban

Urban Share

av.rate

EU Interest Rate

pop

Population

agg.directem

Aggregated Direct Emissions

Source

IEA

On this page
